name: Space 48
description:
Space 48 is a technology agnostic ecommerce consultancy centred on creating and marketing online shops for forward thinking retailers and brands. The  team of talented Developers, Strategists, Marketers, Project Managers and Creatives deliver bespoke ecommerce solutions to suit a variety of clients from a range of industries with a focus on delivering high quality development, growth strategies and internationalisation.
We mainly specialise in the Magento, Shopware& Shopify Plus platforms.
READ MORE...

locations.address: Acresfield (5th floor), Exchange St, St Ann’s Square
